00026 #include_next <l4/sys/ipc.h>

00028 #ifdef __GNUC__
00029 
00030 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00031 #include <l4/sys/syscall_defs.h>
00032 
00033 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00034 l4_ipc_call(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00035             l4_msgtag_t tag,
00036             l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00037 {
00038   register l4_umword_t _dest     __asm__("r2") = dest | L4_SYSF_CALL;
00039   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00040   register l4_umword_t _flags    __asm__("r4") = 0;
00041   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0") = tag;
00042   (void)utcb;
00043   __asm__ __volatile__
00044     ("@ l4_ipc_call(start) \n\t"
00045      "mov     lr, pc       \n\t"
00046      "mov     pc, %[sc]    \n\t"
00047      "@ l4_ipc_call(end)   \n\t"
00048      :
00049      "=r" (_dest),
00050      "=r" (_timeout),
00051      "=r" (_flags),
00052      "=r" (_tag)
00053      :
00054      [sc] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00055      "0" (_dest),
00056      "1" (_timeout),
00057      "2" (_flags),
00058      "3" (_tag)
00059      : "cc", "memory", "lr");
00060   tag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00061   return tag;
00062 }
00063 
00064 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00065 l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(l4_utcb_t *utcb, l4_msgtag_t tag,
00066                       l4_umword_t *label,
00067                       l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00068 {
00069   register l4_umword_t _dest     __asm__("r2") = L4_INVALID_CAP | L4_SYSF_REPLY_AND_WAIT;
00070   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00071   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0") = tag;
00072   register l4_umword_t _flags    __asm__("r4") = 0;
00073   (void)utcb;
00074 
00075   __asm__ __volatile__
00076     ("@ l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(start) \n\t"
00077      "mov     lr, pc               \n\t"
00078      "mov     pc, %[sc]              \n\t"
00079      "@ l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(end)   \n\t"
00080      :
00081      "=r" (_dest),
00082      "=r" (_timeout),
00083      "=r" (_flags),
00084      "=r" (_tag)
00085      :
00086      [sc] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00087      "0" (_dest),
00088      "1" (_timeout),
00089      "2" (_flags),
00090      "3" (_tag)
00091      :
00092      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00093   *label = _flags;
00094   tag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00095   return tag;
00096 }

00099 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00100 l4_ipc_send_and_wait(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00101                      l4_msgtag_t tag,
00102                      l4_umword_t *src,
00103                      l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00104 {
00105   register l4_umword_t _dest     __asm__("r2") = dest | L4_SYSF_SEND_AND_WAIT;
00106   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00107   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0") = tag;
00108   register l4_umword_t _flags    __asm__("r4") = 0;
00109   (void)utcb;
00110 
00111   __asm__ __volatile__
00112     ("@ l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(start) \n\t"
00113      "mov     lr, pc               \n\t"
00114      "mov     pc, %[sc]              \n\t"
00115      "@ l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(end)   \n\t"
00116      :
00117      "=r" (_dest),
00118      "=r" (_timeout),
00119      "=r" (_flags),
00120      "=r" (_tag)
00121      :
00122      [sc] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00123      "0" (_dest),
00124      "1" (_timeout),
00125      "2" (_flags),
00126      "3" (_tag)
00127      :
00128      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00129   *src = _flags;
00130   tag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00131   return tag;
00132 }

00134 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00135 l4_ipc_send(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00136             l4_msgtag_t tag,
00137             l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00138 {
00139   register l4_umword_t _dest     __asm__("r2") = dest | L4_SYSF_SEND;
00140   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00141   register l4_umword_t _flags    __asm__("r4") = 0;
00142   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0") = tag;
00143   (void)utcb;
00144 
00145   __asm__ __volatile__
00146     ("@  l4_ipc_send(start) \n\t"
00147      "mov     lr, pc        \n\t"
00148      "mov     pc, %[sc]       \n\t"
00149      "@  l4_ipc_send(end)   \n\t"
00150      :
00151      "=r" (_dest),
00152      "=r" (_timeout),
00153      "=r" (_flags),
00154      "=r" (_tag)
00155      :
00156      [sc] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00157      "0" (_dest),
00158      "1" (_timeout),
00159      "2" (_flags),
00160      "3" (_tag)
00161      :
00162      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00163   tag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00164   return tag;
00165 }

00167 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00168 l4_ipc_wait(l4_utcb_t *utcb, l4_umword_t *src,
00169             l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00170 {
00171   l4_msgtag_t rtag;
00172   register l4_umword_t _r        __asm__("r2") = L4_INVALID_CAP | L4_SYSF_WAIT;
00173   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00174   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0");
00175   register l4_umword_t _flags    __asm__("r4") = 0;
00176   (void)utcb;
00177   _tag.raw = 0;
00178 
00179   __asm__ __volatile__
00180     ("@ l4_ipc_wait(start) \n\t"
00181      "mov     lr, pc     \n\t"
00182      "mov     pc, %[sc]    \n\t"
00183      "@ l4_ipc_wait(end)   \n\t"
00184      :
00185      "=r"(_r),
00186      "=r"(_timeout),
00187      "=r"(_flags),
00188      "=r"(_tag)
00189      :
00190      [sc] "i"(L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00191      "0"(_r),
00192      "1"(_timeout),
00193      "2"(_flags),
00194      "3"(_tag)
00195 
00196      :
00197      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00198   *src     = _flags;
00199   rtag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00200   return rtag;
00201 }
00202 
00203 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00204 l4_ipc_receive(l4_cap_idx_t src, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00205                l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00206 {
00207   l4_msgtag_t rtag;
00208   register l4_umword_t _r        __asm__("r2") = src | L4_SYSF_RECV;
00209   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00210   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0");
00211   register l4_umword_t _flags    __asm__("r4") = 0;
00212   (void)utcb;
00213 
00214   _tag.raw = 0;
00215 
00216   __asm__ __volatile__
00217     ("@ l4_ipc_receive(start)  \n\t"
00218      "mov     lr, pc           \n\t"
00219      "mov     pc, %[sc]        \n\t"
00220      "@ l4_ipc_receive(end)    \n\t"
00221      :
00222      "=r"(_r),
00223      "=r"(_timeout),
00224      "=r"(_flags),
00225      "=r"(_tag)
00226      :
00227      [sc] "i"(L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00228      "0"(_r),
00229      "1"(_timeout),
00230      "2"(_flags),
00231      "3"(_tag)
00232      :
00233      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00234   rtag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00235   return rtag;
00236 }

00238 // todo: let all calls above use this single call
00239 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00240 l4_ipc(l4_cap_idx_t dest, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00241        l4_umword_t flags,
00242        l4_umword_t slabel,
00243        l4_msgtag_t tag,
00244        l4_umword_t *rlabel,
00245        l4_timeout_t timeout) L4_NOTHROW
00246 {
00247   register l4_umword_t _dest     __asm__("r2") = dest | flags;
00248   register l4_umword_t _timeout  __asm__("r3") = timeout.raw;
00249   register l4_msgtag_t _tag      __asm__("r0") = tag;
00250   register l4_umword_t _lab      __asm__("r4") = slabel;
00251   (void)utcb;
00252 
00253   __asm__ __volatile__
00254     ("@ l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(start) \n\t"
00255      "mov     lr, pc               \n\t"
00256      "mov     pc, %[sc]              \n\t"
00257      "@ l4_ipc_reply_and_wait(end)   \n\t"
00258      :
00259      "=r" (_dest),
00260      "=r" (_timeout),
00261      "=r" (_lab),
00262      "=r" (_tag)
00263      :
00264      [sc] "i" (L4_SYSCALL_INVOKE),
00265      "0" (_dest),
00266      "1" (_timeout),
00267      "2" (_lab),
00268      "3" (_tag)
00269      :
00270      "cc", "memory", "lr");
00271   *rlabel = _lab;
00272   tag.raw = _tag.raw; // because gcc doesn't return out of registers variables
00273   return tag;
00274 }
